description: BR-31 is the Regional Transport Office serving the Vaishali district, with its headquarters located in the city of Hajipur. As a key administrative center under the Bihar Transport Department, it oversees vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport permits for the region. Situated strategically near the state capital Patna, this office facilitates vital transport connectivity across the Ganges via the Mahatma Gandhi Setu.
address: District Transport Office, Yadav Colony Road, Vishunpur Paltu, Hajipur, Vaishali, Bihar
